summary:
This (mod) adds a Jingasa Hat.
This Hat can be crafted at any forge in the 'Misc' category.
(No perk required). At the leather rack. * Light armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][b][i][color=#efefef][size=6]This (mod) adds a Jingasa Hat.
[/size][/color][/i][/b][b][i][color=#efefef][size=6]This Hat can be crafted at any forge in the 'Misc' category.
[/size][/color][/i][/b][b][i][color=#efefef][size=6](No perk required). At the leather rack. * Light armor.
